Key Match Events: Cummins hit a six over midwicket.
Jadeja dropped a catch from Cummins.
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed satisfaction with the team's performance and emphasized the importance of playing well as a team.
Mitchell Marsh acknowledged India's superior performance and expressed hope for Bangladesh to win against Afghanistan.
Rohit Sharma was named player of the match and discussed his approach to batting and the conditions at the Daren Sammy National Cricket Stadium.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India secured top spot in their Super Eight group and will face England in the semifinals.
Australia will have to wait for the result of the Afghanistan vs Bangladesh match to see if they qualify for the semifinals.
